name: react-fancy-button
description: A button with a spinner that is triggered by a boolean

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel src/FancyButton.jsx --out-file dist/FancyButton.js && babel src/Spinner.jsx --out-file dist/Spinner.js && node ./scripts/build-dist && cp src/main.scss dist/FancyButton.scss

author: Points
